name: milla kal
notes:
**milla kal cardigan**

join the **milla kal**! milla is a cardigan knitted from the light and fluffy [novita hehku][1] yarn, and it can be styled in many different ways.

choose your favorite version of the cardigan from **4 different options**: [milla classic][2], [milla cropped][3], [milla long][4] & [milla wrap][5].

this versatile cardigan is a true wardrobe staple. the **milla cardigan** pattern is suitable even for beginners, and it includes four different versions, a wide size range from xs to 5xl, and numerous color options. you can also easily adapt the pattern to suit your own style: choose whether you want short, three-quarter, or long sleeves for your milla cardigan, and finish it off with details like pockets, buttons, or ties.

choose your favorite version, buy the yarn, and join the knit-along! a new part of the pattern will be released on [novita.com][6] every monday starting june 16th. pattern is divided in 5 sections and the last part of the pattern will be released on monday 14th of july.

the milla cardigan is knitted with [novita hehku][7], a striking mohair blend yarn made of 60% mohair and 40% wool. over 20 color options available in novita's online store!
